channel.title: CVE Feed for wpdevart -- Poll, Survey, Questionnaire and Voting system
channel.description: The latest CVEs for wpdevart -- Poll, Survey, Questionnaire and Voting system

item.title: CVE-2021-24442|2024-08-03T19:28:23.964Z -- wpdevart -- poll%2C%20survey%2C%20questionnaire%20and%20voting%20system
item.description: The Poll, Survey, Questionnaire and Voting system WordPress plugin before 1.5.3 did not sanitise, escape or validate the date_answers[] POST parameter before using it in a SQL statement when sending a Poll result, allowing unauthenticated users to perform SQL Injection attacks
